xml.name: Extract variable
xml.Try: Press IntroduceVariable to extract a 50 constant to y variable or field.
xml.Text: Extract variable refactoring does not require you to select the exact code you want to extract. You can just place the cursor on the statement you want to extract and then select the needed expression.
xml.Try: Now press IntroduceVariable and extract the CGRect to a frame variable by selecting it from the list.
